This cinematic adventure captures the sights, sounds, and sweeping beauty of our celestial home. Feel the wind rush past as you glide over landmarks, soar above skylines, and see the world as you've never seen them before... from the air! Part of the Disneyland® Resort 70th Celebration, this ride-along invites you to rediscover our planet the way only Disney can show it. Nice work, pal, we hope you enjoy your flight.","popularity":0.1581,"poster_path":"/4EpKx6oNAMVAOe4QQRrFZcc0JYL.jpg","release_date":"2025-07-17","title":"Soarin' Around the World | Disneyland Resort","video":false,"vote_average":0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/iPctFiHFUgBA3FvNGVMeESsEZWm.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":1516839,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Incredicoaster | Disneyland Resort","overview":"Get ready supers, because the Incredicoaster is a go for launch! Violet's throwing force fields. And Edna? She's not impressed, yet. From the first countdown to the final drop, this adrenaline-packed experience delivers nonstop fun straight from the world of The Incredibles.
